app.name: eyeson
app.short_description: Video conferencing app providing online meeting rooms in your Zendesk tickets.
app.long_description:
Eyeson is a video conferencing app which provides your Zendesk team with online meeting rooms. Thanks to Single Stream Technology, eyeson meetings rooms are not affected by the number of active participants therefore providing HD quality while keeping your bandwidth low. Start a call one of your tickets and open the online meeting room for you and your team members.

Benefit from video conferencing, integrated chat feed, screencasting, file presentation and guest login (invite a non-Zendesk team member to join the meeting room).

Happy collaborating!

Contact developers at office@eyeson.team
app.installation_instructions:
To install the eyeson app:

1. Sign in to your Zendesk Support account, then click the Admin icon in the sidebar.
2. Select Marketplace under Apps, then find the eyeson app and click the tile.
3. On the eyeson app page, click Install app in the upper-right corner.
4. Enter a name for the app, then click Install.
